"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e1a2f636872717ebf5b00#post_555e1a2f636872717ebf5b00
Okay; hold up, the Oblivion series is based off Scandinavia lore.  I can understand if you're changing completely how a character looked initially (like if you turn a Argonian into a human), a lot of mods fuck that up, but keep in mind Scandinavian countries are so white that trying to find people is like trying to find a polar bear in a blizzard.
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e1bf86368723b79080400#post_555e1bf86368723b79080400

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e1ee36368720aa0951600#post_555e1ee36368720aa0951600
>Bad people

Or they just want to have a game full of people they personally find attractive

Not finding 'people of color' sexually attractive does not equal racism, saying people who mod game characters into white people because they find that more attractive is like saying people who only have fantasies of white women are horrible racists. Nope, they just don't find 'poc' attractive, and they have every right to mod their game however they wish.
